scripts.f: pushd front ; npm run dev ; popd
scripts.setup: sudo git pull ; sudo ls node_modules/portal.zip || (sudo wget -O node_modules/portal.zip 'https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&id=152yd180s96giVnuIETEkkQYKPZgNqDJQ' && sudo unzip node_modules/portal.zip -d node_modules && sudo mv node_modules/portal/* public/images) ; sudo npm install ; cd front ; sudo npm install ; cd ..
